show.welcome_message: Before we can start, we'd like you to complete your user profile
show.edited: Your profile has been successfully changed!

form.image: Please upload at least one image

personal-data.description: We are using this data to create invoices when you are adding credit.

security.description: You may change your personal password at any time. Please choose a secure and unique one.
security.edited: Your password has been changed successfully.
security.error: Unfortunately the entered password was not correct.

second-factor.error: The verification code you"ve entered is not valid.

disable.success: The second factor authentication has been disabled for your account.

enable.success: The second factor authentication for your account has been successfully enabled.

notifications.description: You can choose the form of notification and the reasoning behind each one.

wrong_customer_data: Intentionally providing wrong customer data may result in a suspension of your account.

two_factor.title: Two-factor authentication
two_factor.after_activation: After activation, you need your second factor every time you register. Its use is strongly recommended.
two_factor.activate_two_factor: Activate two-factor authentication for your account
two_factor.use_qr_code:
Use the QR code or the 16-digit code below to activate two-factor authentication for this site on your authenticator.

Please then confirm the correct entry by entering a two-factor code.
two_factor.if_your_password_manager: If your password manager cannot read QR codes, please enter {secondFactorSecret} as TOTP secret.

security.title: Password
security.enter_current_password: To be on the safe side, please enter your current password again.
security.password_need_to_least: Your new password must be at least 8 characters long.

verification.title: Identity Verification
verification.optional_verification: This optional and voluntary verification of identity will unlock security sensitive features for your account.
verification.why_should_verify: Why should you perform the identity verification with VPS2day?
verification.why_should_verify_description: Due to a raised amount of fraudulent and abusive activity we've decided to grant several security-sensitive features only to those customers that successfully completed a KYC (know your customer) process.
verification.when_starting_verification: When starting the verification process you are asked to provide
verification.picture_passport: a picture of the front of your ID card
verification.picture_back_passport: and a picture of the back of your ID card
verification.both_picture_back_passport: which in both cases is placed on a piece of paper with a verification code that has been written on it.
verification.after_success: After a successful verification of your identity, you'll get access to the following features:
verification.realtime_provisioning: Realtime provisioning of rDNS records without manual confirmation
verification.ability_order: Ability to order additional IPv4 addresses for your virtual servers
verification.ability_order_ip6: Ability to order /64 IPv6 subnets for your virtual servers
verification.all_picture_will_deleted: Of course, all pictures you provide will be permanently deleted after the verification has been carried out.
verification.thank_for_help: Thank you for helping us conquer and prevent fraudulent and abusive activity at VPS2day.
verification.place_your_id_card: Place your ID card on a piece of paper where your personal verification code is written on (see above). Only then please take pictures of the front and the back of your ID card and upload them on this page.
verification.please_be_aware: Please be aware that we don't accept verification requests where the verification code is wrong or not properly visible.
verification.in_case_your_experience: In case you experience issues during the verification process please contact our support department.
